name: The Real Housewives of Miami
overview: Six of the most influential and connected women live life to the fullest in the sunny city where both the party and the drama never stop.

episodes.name: Paradise Cost
episodes.overview: We meet the ladies of Miami, who can weather the heat, even if it's of the drama variety.

episodes.name: Black Ball'd
episodes.overview: It's party central between a ladies' luncheon (with transportation issues) and an all-star gala (with an interloper). See the shots from the shindigs here.

episodes.name: Optical Delusion
episodes.overview: Art-house owner Adriana hosts a gallery opening, but the event begins to fizzle when the artist doesn't complete his paintings in time and her backup entertainment fails to impress.

episodes.name: Waterfront & Center
episodes.overview: After 'crashing' the gala, Cristy is shocked to get an invoice from Lea; Adriana frets over her finances; and vegetarian Lea unwittingly rocks up to Alexia's hog roast.

episodes.name: Beach Slap
episodes.overview: Larsa invites the ladies to a cooking lesson; Cristy and Alexia are in a fashion show for charity.

episodes.name: Miami Mamis Know Best
episodes.overview: The ladies close out the season with salacious psychic reading, and a surprise luncheon that brings the heat, literally.

episodes.name: Watch What Happens Live: Miami Housewives Reunion
episodes.overview: The ladies of Miami get together to set the record straight, solving some of the biggest controversies of the season.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Miamis
episodes.overview: The wives return for a new series of intense rivalries, eavesdropping and confrontations. Plus, a new set of socialites are about to shake their world.

episodes.name: Text, Lies and Your Smile Is Fake
episodes.overview: Karent confronts Ana about her the texts she's sent to her boyfriend Rodolfo. Plus, Joanna demands to know why fiance Romain is stalling.

episodes.name: A Mynt Meltdown
episodes.overview: After repeatedly deflecting Frederic's talk of marriage, Adriana is caught flirting with Joanna's fiance Romain.

episodes.name: She beat me to the Tweet!
episodes.overview: Romain threatens Joanna with leaving after her meltdown; Adriana excludes Karent from a Dali exhibit; Ana defends Marysol; Lisa warns Karent about the other women.

episodes.name: Eager Beaver
episodes.overview: Joanna tries to mend a struggling relationship. Also Karent receives some advice on how to deal with the mean-spirited people in her life. Meanwhile drama flows when all the ladies attend a noble charity gala; Karent gets a warning about Adriana, and Alexia throws her first bash in months.

episodes.name: Sexting Candles
episodes.overview: Miami's high society anticipates Alexia's big bash; Adriana revs up to confront Karent but will things go smoothly or get out of control; and Joanna discovers that there's a downside to being a supermodel. Also: Hidden E-mails come into play that ensure a lot of drama & controversy.

episodes.name: Bras and Brawls (1)
episodes.overview: Notorious filmmaker Joe Francis is in town as Lisa hosts a lingerie party where half-naked Miami socialites start acting as naughty as their underwear.

episodes.name: Bras and Brawls (2)
episodes.overview: Marta makes a confession at Lisa's party that sends Joanna on the rampage. The night spirals further out of control when Elaine confronts Karent's friend.

episodes.name: Conflicting Conflict
episodes.overview: Tensions are still running high as the ladies head to the Black's Annual Gala. Lea turns to a psychic for help and Marysol and Ana talk divorce.

episodes.name: A Better or Bitter Place
episodes.overview: With the housewives more divided than ever, Joanna heads to a beach volleyball contest. Meanwhile, heart- broken Lea tries to wipe away the tears.

episodes.name: Uncomfortably Public Relations
episodes.overview: Lea is advised to patch things up with Marysol, but discord takes center stage when the ladies attend Miami socialite Lisa Pliner's shoe showcase. Marta moves back to Joanna and Romain's home and Karent tries to smooth things over with the ladies by organizing a dinner party.

episodes.name: Parents Fly South
episodes.overview: Adriana throws a memorable party for Fredric's parents' 50th wedding anniversary that has her questioning if she's really ready to get married again.

episodes.name: Elsa Foretells a Storm
episodes.overview: The ladies hope to repair their friendships during a trip to the Bahamas, but when one wife learns some terrible news, a wave of drama follows.

episodes.name: Surrounded By Hot Water
episodes.overview: Karent debates whether to confront Rodolfo about the article. Meanwhile, Lea and Marysol ruin a special dinner by finally hashing out their issues.

episodes.name: Healing Hole
episodes.overview: Relationships are on the chopping block as the women return from Bimini with new-found confidence and a desire to turn their lives around.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Hosted by Bravo's Andy Cohen, Part 1 brings Lea Black, Marysol Patton, Adriana De Moura, Ana Quincoces, Joanna Krupa, Karent Sierra, and Lisa Hochstein to rehash this season's drama.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Hosted by Bravo's Andy Cohen, part two reunites Lea Black, Marysol Patton, Adriana De Moura, Ana Quincoces, Joanna Krupa, Karent Sierra, and Lisa Hochstein to discuss catfights and confrontations on this season. Alexia Echevarria and Elsa Patton join the ladies to rehash the drama.

episodes.name: Lost Footage
episodes.overview: Host Andy Cohen opens up the Bravo vault to show never before seen footage, from Adriana’s dramatic acting gig to Lea’s unconventional relationship with her housekeeper, Freida, and much more.

episodes.name: Til Lies Do Us Part
episodes.overview: Adriana and Lea deal with fallout from a scandal; Lisa's attempt to get the group together falls apart.

episodes.name: Hurricane Adriana
episodes.overview: Adriana and Lea's feud comes to a head; Romain has a question for Joanna that may jeopardize their wedding; Lisa has problems with the property she's buying.

episodes.name: Booby-Trapped
episodes.overview: Adriana and Lea's feud divides the group; Alexis reveals a secret from her past.

episodes.name: Black Magic
episodes.overview: Romain surprises Joanna, but doesn't show to their first therapy appointment; Marysol visits her psychic and gets shocking news; Lea reveals a secret to Lisa; Frederic confronts Romain.

episodes.name: A Cause for Concern
episodes.overview: Lea's annual gala; Alexia struggles to pick a side; Lisa tries to cope with the idea that she needs a surrogate.

episodes.name: A Ple-Thora of Lies
episodes.overview: Lisa endures another visit from her in-laws; Adriana and Lea continue to fight; the ladies come together for a birthday party at Lea's house.

episodes.name: La La Land
episodes.overview: Joanna gets help with her wedding; Alexis ex-husband has trouble with the law; Adriana's wedding plans hit complications.

episodes.name: Mama Elsa Comes Home
episodes.overview: Joanna and Adriana try to reconcile; Elsa comes home from the hospital; the sex therapist assigns Joanna and Romain homework; Alexia and Peter try to work through their issues.

episodes.name: Birkin Buddies
episodes.overview: Adriana makes unreasonable demands; Marysol and Alexis try to stop Adriana from ruining her own wedding; Romain and Joanna find more problems between them; Lisa comes to Lea's defense.

episodes.name: Brazillian Bridezilla
episodes.overview: Adriana and Frederik want their marriage recognized by the church; wedding plans turn Adriana into a "Bridezilla."

episodes.name: The Black Sheep
episodes.overview: Lea and RJ bring Lisa to Texas; Alexia and Herman celebrate their anniversary; Marysol's mother's deteriorating health causes her to break down; Joanna and Romain receive some unexpected news; Romain surprises Joanna.

episodes.name: Bridesmaid Breakdown
episodes.overview: Lisa is determined to get Lea and Adriana back together; Joanna is becoming stressed and takes it out on Lisa; Adriana and Lea meet to try to settle their issues.

episodes.name: Blame It on the Alcohol
episodes.overview: The ladies go to Vegas to celebrate Joanna's last night as a single woman; Adriana tries to mend her relationship with Lea; Joanna and Adriana start to bond.

episodes.name: Mrs. Zago
episodes.overview: Joanna and Romain's wedding; Lisa and Alexia get some good news; Adriana sees a new side to Lea.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: The ladies discuss some of the season's antics; Joanna and Lisa's friendship goes sour; Adriana continues to defend herself.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: After Joanna makes accusations about her, Lisa is in attack mode; Marysol Patton visits and adds her insight.

episodes.name: ¡Bienvenidos! Same Beaches, New Shade
episodes.overview: The ladies reunite with an old friend and meet new ones; Alexia seeks closure about her marriage.

episodes.name: Sushi Rolls and Wedding Woes
episodes.overview: Alexia plans her wedding but hits multiple roadblocks; sushi night reveals Todd and Peter's drama.

episodes.name: Painted with Pride
episodes.overview: Larsa puts her house on the market; Nicole reveals her traumatizing childhood to Lisa; Alexia meets Herman’s lover; Adriana hosts Martina’s first solo art show while juggling two dates.

episodes.name: It's Your Party and I'll Cry if I Want To
episodes.overview: Julia and Guerdy share shocking revelations about their past; Larsa goes house hunting; Adriana receives a foot massage that rubs Martina the wrong way; the ladies celebrate Julia's birthday, but Adriana and Guerdy come to blows.

episodes.name: Family Therapy
episodes.overview: Julia aims to resolve her birthday drama; Nicole contemplates rebuilding a relationship with her dad; Alexia's family is torn apart as her fiancé and son go head-to-head.

episodes.name: Flirting at the Faena
episodes.overview: Alexia finally finds her perfect wedding venue, only for it to fall through; Lisa hosts a flirtatious slumber party at the Faena Hotel; Nicole hopes to reconcile with her father, but it's not the reunion she had hoped for.

episodes.name: Bling, Boobs and Bickering
episodes.overview: The ladies head to the Hamptons, but Lisa wants to go back home when she learns they have to share rooms; Nicole confronts Alexia about her snappy attitude; Marysol drops a bomb that leaves everyone wondering whether they can trust Nicole.

episodes.name: Le Fin?
episodes.overview: As the Hamptons trip continues, the ladies try to put last night's drama behind them with some boxing, a little retail therapy and a lot of alcohol. Guerdy later joins the group for dinner, where Julia blindsides Adriana with an unexpected proposal.

episodes.name: Hamptons Hangover
episodes.overview: The house panics as Julia wakes up with a medical emergency; Adriana throws some shade Lisa's way, threatening to derail Larsa's jewelry launch; Nicole confronts Marysol; the ladies celebrate Lisa's birthday and reveal their sexual fantasies.

episodes.name: Looking for Trouble
episodes.overview: Back in Miami, Lisa struggles at home, but Lenny shows her no sympathy; a single ladies' night takes an awkward turn after a certain celebrity friend of Larsa's is brought into the conversation; Guerdy's charity event is overtaken by group drama.

episodes.name: Versace and Venom
episodes.overview: Larsa moves forward with selling her family house; Alexia finalizes her wedding plans; the ladies get together for Alexia's bachelorette party, but the fun quickly gets nasty after old feuds are reignited.

episodes.name: No Wedding and a Funeral
episodes.overview: Alexia's Bachelorette party ends with a guest leaving the table in a huff; Larsa finally signs her divorce papers, as her mothers health takes a turn for the worse. Alexia's dream wedding day begins to crumble.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: The ladies reunite to discuss what happened during and after the season; Larsa gets grilled about her looks and OnlyFans; Julia reveals shocking details surrounding the death of her son; Nicole, Marysol and Alexia rehash their Hamptons drama.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: As the reunion concludes, Alexia revisits all of her traumatizing trials and tribulations throughout the season; Lisa comes to terms with her marriage; Adriana and Larsa go head-to-head over a certain someone's penis.

episodes.name: Not So New Beginnings
episodes.overview: A grudge between Guerdy and Alexia taints her long-awaited wedding celebration; Larsa hosts a "new beginnings" party, but falls into old habits when she discovers a joke made at her expense; on Star Island, trouble bubbles in Lisa's marriage.

episodes.name: Rock the Boat
episodes.overview: Julia struggles with empty nesting in her marriage; Nicole's mom gives her some tough love; after a year of tragedy, Alexia finally celebrates her nuptials with her family and friends on a luxe yacht, but Lisa and Larsa rock the boat.

episodes.name: Date Night Disaster
episodes.overview: Alexia struggles with her son's life decisions; Julia decides to restart her modeling career; Nicole hosts a beach day where Alexia questions if Adriana's wedding date is married; Lisa's romantic night with Lenny turns out to be anything but.

episodes.name: Hot Mic in Miami
episodes.overview: Larsa hosts a paw-ty for her dog's birthday; Nicole receives upsetting and possibly threatening news from her father; Julia worries that Martina may leave her; Lisa hosts a pool party for the ladies where Lenny's true intentions are revealed.

episodes.name: Destination: Divorce
episodes.overview: Tensions rise between Julia and Martina during a family dinner with their daughter; Nicole takes the girls out on her private boat for the day; as the ladies head to Key West, they wonder what's wrong with Lisa.

episodes.name: Dumped and Dumbfounded
episodes.overview: In Key West, Lisa goes into detail about Lenny leaving her for a younger woman; while celebrating her birthday, Alexia insults Julia and her birthplace; Lisa panics that Lenny is bringing his girlfriend into her home with her children there.

episodes.name: Stars and Cigars
episodes.overview: Guerdy reaches a boiling point with the group; on the final night of the trip, Adriana tries to get to the bottom of her date's marital status; Lisa and Larsa confront Lenny and his girlfriend at the Formula 1 event.

episodes.name: Sing and Shout
episodes.overview: Adriana films a music video for her new single, "Fyah," on a yacht; Alexia and Guerdy rock the boat when they come to final blows; Julia hosts a housewarming party; Larsa confronts Julia about kissing a man.

episodes.name: Hot off the Press
episodes.overview: Lisa discovers both Lenny and his girlfriend are talking to the press about her marriage; Julia and Martina reconnect and make big plans for the future; Alexia hosts a charity event where a rumor comes to light that could threaten Nicole's career.

episodes.name: Diamond Rings and Rumors
episodes.overview: Larsa receives an unexpected package; Guerdy puts work aside to make time for family game night; Julia starts spreading the news about her adoption plans; at her engagement party, Nicole avoids her dad and defends her reputation against a rumor.

episodes.name: Black Card Energy
episodes.overview: Adriana's date confronts the women over his marital status; Alexia hosts a legal luncheon that starts informative but turns explosive when Nicole asks about defamation; Lenny unexpectedly returns home, and tensions rise as Lisa tries to talk to him.

episodes.name: Apology Not Accepted
episodes.overview: Larsa shows Lisa her support and a good time by taking her to a Miami hot spot; Julia struggles to make progress in the adoption process; Alexia, Nicole, Guerdy and Marysol's quadruple date heats up when Anthony and Todd exchange words.

episodes.name: Brujeria in the Bahamas
episodes.overview: In the Bahamas, the ladies have fun in the sun and get wild on the water rides; Julia surprises the girls with a gift but is met with mixed reactions; Alexia and Adriana are forced to confront one another after Larsa causes a stir.

episodes.name: Rage, Release, Repeat
episodes.overview: Marysol arrives in the Bahamas and receives hurtful news about her ex; after an explosive dinner, a rage ritual ends in injury; while on a private island, Adriana makes a comment about Alexia's son that causes her to go off the deep end.

episodes.name: Lines in the Sand
episodes.overview: While in the Bahamas, Alexia unleashes her wrath on Adriana; Nicole and Guerdy are stuck in the middle when the group ostracizes Adriana and Julia; Lisa receives support from Lea Black but loses an ally in her mother-in-law.

episodes.name: Melting Pot Meltdown
episodes.overview: Lisa stands up for herself against her mother-in-law; Peter confides in his father about his mom; Nicole and her dad confront their issues; Guerdy hosts a melting pot party where Adriana pleads with Alexia and Marysol for forgiveness.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: The Miami ladies reunite in New York City to bring both the heat and the fashion; Lisa shocks the women with more revelations about her and Lenny's history; Guerdy, Julia and Adriana hold Alexia accountable for her words and actions.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Larsa opens up about her new boyfriend, Marcus Jordan, and defends her fighting tactics; Julia gives an update on Martina's multiple battles with cancer; Kiki joins the ladies and drops a bomb on Lisa.

episodes.name: Reunion (3)
episodes.overview: The ladies reminisce about Lisa and Lenny's wild parties; Alexia, Marysol and Adriana confront their drama from the Bahamas, opening old wounds in the process; a mysterious letter leaves jaws on the floor.

episodes.name: Nuevos Horizontes
episodes.overview: Lisa navigates a new relationship while battling through her divorce; Alexia hosts a party in hopes of bringing the group back together, but her husband is MIA; Guerdy receives a devastating health update that will affect her life forever.

episodes.name: Champagne Confessions
episodes.overview: The ladies question if all is well in Alexia's marriage; Marysol hosts a boozy gay brunch; Nicole arranges a champagne happy hour; Guerdy reveals to her closest girlfriends that she has breast cancer and reaches a breaking point with Larsa.

episodes.name: Loose Lips
episodes.overview: Guerdy confides in Larsa that she has cancer, but Larsa repeats the news to her guests at Marcus' welcome home party; Nicole decides to have another baby; Julia takes opera lessons to surprise Martina, but upsets her wife in the process.

episodes.name: Slam Dunks and Friendship Flunks
episodes.overview: Larsa and Marcus host a charity basketball game where all the ladies attempt, and fail, to play ball. Adriana's flatulence leads to an argument while trapped in a van. Alexia receives a lavish birthday gift.

episodes.name: A Night at the Opera
episodes.overview: Adriana receives a therapy treatment and has an emotional out-of-body experience. Guerdy discovers that Larsa betrayed her trust. Julia hosts a F Cancer party in honor of Martina's recovery, but Lisa is held up by the police.

episodes.name: Farmer of the Opera
episodes.overview: Julia surprises Martina with an opera performance she will never forget; Guerdy puts Larsa on blast for broadcasting her cancer diagnosis; Lisa hosts the ladies in Palm Beach, where Julia begins to question her growing friendship with Alexia.

episodes.name: Dildo & Dildon't
episodes.overview: While in Palm Beach, a startling discovery is made during a scavenger hunt. Kiki erupts after Lisa talks about Lenny one too many times. Julia admits to befriending Marysol's ex. Lenny accuses Lisa of bleeding him dry financially.

episodes.name: Palm Beach Pandemonium
episodes.overview: The ladies play croquet in Palm Beach. Lisa is interrogated at dinner about her financial, parenting, and relationship choices. Nicole's family expands in a way that she could have never imagined. Lenny files a motion citing Lisa as an unfit mother.

episodes.name: Mamacita Madness, Part 1
episodes.overview: Alexia discovers she must vacate her home in 15 days. Nicole takes a DNA test to see if she has any other unknown siblings out there. A ghost from the girls' past causes a Mother's Day Lunch to meltdown before it even begins.

episodes.name: Mamacita Madness, Part 2
episodes.overview: Lisa unleashes her rage on the women for questioning her parenting; Alexia and Marysol come face-to-face with Ana and blame Nicole for setting them up; Guerdy undergoes surgery for cancer removal.

episodes.name: Invite Only
episodes.overview: Marysol hosts a shopping spree luncheon; Nicole is brought to tears after learning she is being iced out from the group; Julia forces Adriana to come clean; Alexia and Lisa's bickering brings Guerdy to a breaking point.

episodes.name: Sink or Swim
episodes.overview: Julia walks the runway for the first time in 24 years; Nicole and the Bros get to the bottom of The Mother's Day Massacre; Alexia invites the ladies to Mexico City; Guerdy shares a devastating health update.

episodes.name: Miami in Mexico
episodes.overview: The ladies arrive in Mexico City, but Larsa and Alexia start the trip off on the wrong foot; Guerdy discovers someone has been speaking poorly about her to the press; a sexual and provocative dinner experience brings some truths to light.

episodes.name: Row, Row, Row Me Off this Boat
episodes.overview: An emotional visit to the Virgin of Guadalupe brings the ladies closer together; Lisa loses it as she tries to settle with Lenny mere days before their court date; a gondola ride turns into a battleship when a juice box and words are thrown.

episodes.name: Get Me Off This Gondola!
episodes.overview: The ladies scramble to get Guerdy off the gondola and into an ambulance; Adriana performs at Mexico City Pride; Kiki reaches her breaking point with Lisa.

episodes.name: Adios Mexico!
episodes.overview: The Miami Mamis say adios to Mexico City; Nicole comes face to face with her father's girlfriend; Michael Jordan states his disapproval of Larsa's relationship with his son.

episodes.name: Havana Nights
episodes.overview: Alexia moves into her new apartment; Guerdy shaves her head in preparation for chemotherapy; Adriana hosts a release party for her new song with Emilio Estefan; Larsa and Guerdy's ongoing feud explodes and forces Russell to step in and speak up.

episodes.name: Reunion Part 1
episodes.overview: The Miami ladies reunite in dramatic fashion -- and fashions -- in New York City; Kiki confronts Larsa about her behavior since dating Marcus; Adriana recites a poem dedicated to Alexia; accusations and lies fracture Alexia and Larsa's friendship.

episodes.name: Reunion Part 2
episodes.overview: Alexia and Larsa's backstage argument escalates; Lisa is sickened when the group doesn't show her sympathy; Nicole discusses her father's passing and defends herself against Mamacita Madness.
